scripts.test: pnpm clean && pnpm compile && forge test --match-path 'test/*.t.sol' -vvv
scripts.deploy:localhost: forge clean && pnpm compile && forge script script/sol/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast
scripts.deploy:holesky: forge clean && pnpm compile && forge script script/sol/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url https://l1rpc.hekla.taiko.xyz/ --broadcast --gas-estimate-multiplier 200
scripts.deploy:devnet: forge clean && pnpm compile && forge script script/sol/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url https://rpc.internal.taiko.xyz --broadcast --gas-estimate-multiplier 200
scripts.deploy:ipfs: rm -rf data/metadata/* && node script/js/resize-images.js && node script/js/add-images-ipfs.js && echo 'IPFS Base URI:' && ipfs add -r ./data/metadata/ && echo 'Update your .env file with the new IPFS URI'
